name: Billy Bonka
description:
WARNING: NO SINGLE PLAYER

Fun party game you could play between football and mortal kombat.


Players control their clunky billiard balls with a cue stuck on it's top. The only goal is to kill other players.

Features

  • Score balls to get buffs!
  • Enjoy clunky physics simulation
  • Several skins and playgrounds

Controls

WASD/Left stick to move.

Space, A on XBOX, X on PS4 to shoot.

E N J O Y
